üöÄ How to Generate Images

  1. Install dependencies: npm install sharp
  2. Ensure your source images are in place:
    • /public/Artboard 5.png - Your splash screen design (2048x2048+ recommended)
    • /public/favicon/android-chrome-512x512.png - Your app logo (512x512)
  3. Run the generator: node generate-splash-screens.js
  4. Refresh this page to see the results
  5. Test on real devices before deploying
